# <a name="adding-emojis-to-email-messages"></a><span data-ttu-id="f69b9-102">Adăugarea emojis de mesaje e-mail</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f69b9-102">Adding emojis to email messages</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f69b9-103">Aveţi posibilitatea să inseraţi emojis în mesajele dumneavoastră.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f69b9-103">You can insert emojis in your messages.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="f69b9-104">Răspuns la un e-mail existent sau selectați **mesaj nou**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f69b9-104">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="f69b9-105">Selectaţi butonul **Inserare emojis**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f69b9-105">Select the **Insert emojis** button</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="f69b9-106">în partea de jos a ferestrei de scriere mesaj pentru a deschide panoul de expresiile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f69b9-106">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="f69b9-107">Caută şi alege emoji sau GIF pe care doriţi să inseraţi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f69b9-107">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>
